data.name: MA_Alert_EndDate_LessThan_StartDate
data.value: You must specify an end time that happens after the start time.
data.comment: Alert message on CampaignActivity and Campaign detailed form if user is trying to supply invalid combination of start and end time/dates.

data.name: MA_Alert_StartDate_GreaterThan_EndDate
data.value: You must specify a start time that happens before the end time.
data.comment: Alert message on CampaignActivity and Campaign detailed form if user is trying to supply invalid combination of start and end time/dates.

data.name: MA_Alert_StartDate_Cannot_Empty
data.value: Start Date cannot be empty.
data.comment: Alert message on CampaignActivity Deactivate form when user tries to remove the populated start date and makes it empty.

data.name: MA_Alert_EndDate_Cannot_Empty
data.value: End Date cannot be empty.
data.comment: Alert message on CampaignActivity Deactivate form when user tries to remove the populated end date and makes it empty.

data.name: MA.Activity.SubjectRequired
data.value: Subject is required.
data.comment: Subject is missing validation message.

data.name: MA.Activity.TemplateRequired
data.value: Template is required.
data.comment: Template is missing validation message.

data.name: MA.Activity.StartTimeRequired
data.value: Start time is required.
data.comment: Start time is missing validation message.

data.name: MA.Activity.EndTimeRequired
data.value: End time is required.
data.comment: End time is missing validation message.

data.name: Form_Title_New_With_Entity_Display_Name
data.value: New {0}
data.comment: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"}. Placeholder 0 is entity display name. [Category="Orion AIR"]

data.name: Object_Singular_CampaignTemplate
data.value: Campaign (Template)

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.DirtyFormForDistribute
data.value: You must save the changes before you can distribute this activity.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.Cannotpropagate
data.value: The Campaign Activity can be distributed only once.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.Cannotpropagate.Nochannel
data.value: Select a channel type, save the form, and then try again.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.Cannotpropagate.NochannelField
data.value: This option is only available when contact method is chosen. A contact method is not available on this form. The activity cannot be distributed. Please contact your {#Brand_CRM} administrator.

data.name: MA.CA.CannotpropagateEmail.MM.Off
data.value: Direct Email via Mail Merge is off. The activity cannot be distributed. Please contact your {#Brand_CRM} administrator.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.Cannotpropagate.Invalidchannel
data.value: Distribute capability is not available for the selected channel

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.Cannotpropagate.Invalidchannel.MM
data.value: Mail Merge is not available in the {#Brand_CRM} Web client. To perform mail merge, you have to use {#Brand_CRM_Outlook_Short}.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.NoListAssociated
data.value: Cannot distribute this Campaign Activity as it has no associated Marketing Lists. Please associate Marketing Lists with this Campaign Activity and try again.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.FillRequiredActivityFields
data.value: Please, fix all warnings and errors on the form.

data.name: MA.CampaignActivity.DistributionWasUnsuccessful
data.value: Cannot distribute this Campaign Activity. Please contact your {#Brand_CRM} administrator.

data.name: MA.Campaign.RemoveItem.Confirmation.Title
data.value: Remove {0}

data.name: MA.Campaign.RemoveItem.Confirmation.Body
data.value: Do you want to remove the selected {0} {1} from the Campaign?

data.name: MiniCampaign_AllItems_NoRecordReturned
data.value: Quick Campaign cannot be created because no records were found on the current page.

data.name: MiniCampaign_SelectedItems_TooManyRecords
data.value: You cannot create a Quick Campaign for more than one marketing list at a time. Please select only one marketing list.

data.name: MiniCampaign_CanNotRun_On_QueryApi
data.value: This option is not available for the current view. Not all views will work with the option {0}. Select a different view or a different Quick Campaign option and try again.
data.comment: {NumberedPlaceholder="{0}"} Placeholder 0 is a text 'For All Records on All Pages'.

data.name: MiniCampaign_CanNotRun_On_InactiveList
data.value: Quick campaigns cannot be run on a Marketing List that is inactive. Activate the Marketing List or select a different Marketing List, and try again.

data.name: MiniCampaign_CanNotRun_On_Associated
data.value: This option is not available for the current view. Select a different Quick Campaign option and try again.

data.value: Owner is required.
data.comment: Owner is missing validation message.

data.name: MA.QueueRequired
data.value: Queue is required.
data.comment: Queue is missing validation message.

data.comment: Menu Item label for invoking Quick Campaign for selected items on current page.

data.name: MA.UnsupportedRibbonAction
data.value: This ribbon action is not supported.

data.name: MA_Error_Message_Action_NoItemSelected
data.value: You must select one or more records before you can perform this action.
data.comment: Shown when a user tries to invoke an action that requires selected records before it can be performed.

data.name: MA_Grid_Apply_Rule_Heterogenous_Type_Records_Selected
data.value: You can only perform this action for records of the same type.
data.comment: Shown when a user tries to invoke an action that requires to be of the same type.

data.name: InProgress_ListAction_Processing_Message
data.value: Processing, please wait ...
data.comment: Shown while processing actions performed on a list.

data.name: MA_Error_Message_Action_MultipleErrorsFound
data.value: An error has occurred. The selected action was not completed for one or more records.
data.comment: Shown when a list action failed for one or more records.

data.value: This campaign cannot be deactivated because there are open campaign activities associated with it. Close the campaign activities and try again. If you contact support, please provide the technical details.
data.comment: Error message when a campaign cannot be deactivated.

data.name: MA.BulkOperation.ContentTooLarge
data.value: Your email content is too large for this wizard. Please create it as an email template and then select that template here.
data.comment: Error message when content is more than the size of the character limit

data.comment: Action is not allowed on list since it locked.
